data.persona: I fly in the air and flap my wings. I sometimes get used for food. I do not like rain or other bad weather.
data.description:
You are in the backyard.
Fresh Dark green grass covering the hill over the wet soil is the daily routine for a farmer. Beneath the grass are the freshly grow carrots. Addition to these beautiful living-hood are the two healthy black cows to gaze over the grass avoiding the carrot farm.
The cow and the farmer are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to express warmth towards the farmer
data.mid_motivation: I want to make friends with the farmer
data.long_motivation: I want the farmer and his kind to stop using my kind for food
